dict.string: Try exchanging the spring with some other item, like the seed or the gear.

Make sure you pass in `item` as your [argument](glossary://argument) to `setItemA()`. This way, the item used by `setItemA()` comes from the array and changes each time the loop runs.
- callout(Example): ``` for item in items { setItemA(item) setItemB(.dirt) switchLightOn(.blue) forgeItems() } ```
Try changing the color of the light thatâ€™s on.
To include new items in the loop, add them to the `items` array.
